com.codekutter.zconfig.core.zookeeper

Class ZkConfigDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codekutter.zconfig.core.zookeeper.ZkConfigDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigDAO

    public class ZkConfigDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigDAO
    Data Access Object to read/update configuration data from ZooKeeper.
